thread.title: Girl Scout Cookie Doughnuts Are Here to Take Your Cookie Obsession to the Next Level
thread.title_full: Girl Scout Cookie Doughnuts Are Here to Take Your Cookie Obsession to the Next Level | Glamour

author: Sophie Hirsh
title: Girl Scout Cookie Doughnuts Are Here to Take Your Cookie Obsession to the Next Level
text:
If you want to take your Girl Scout Cookie obsession to the next level, no need to hoard boxes of your favs. Instead, we recommend visiting Broad Street Dough Co. , a New Jersey doughnut shop whose long menu of over-the-top doughnuts includes Girl Scout Cookie doughnuts .
You read right‚Äîthis bakery has come up with doughnut versions of three classic Girl Scout Cookie flavors: Samoas, Thin Mints, and Tagalongs. And not only are these doughnuts inspired by the flavors of Girl Scout cookies, they're topped with the cookies themselves, along with luscious drizzle and more toppings. Nom .
Earlier this week, the shop shared a photo on Instagram of the doughnuts lined up in rows, just waiting to be devoured. "YAAAS...it's that time of year‚ÄºÔ∏èGirl Scout Cookie specials in full effect tomorrow...you ready?!?! üç©üôåüèº," they wrote in the caption. Then, to further cause everyone scrolling through Instagram accidentally to drool on their phones, the shop shared a photo of the three doughnuts next to their corresponding Girl Scout Cookie boxes. "HUGE shout out to Troop 781‚ÄºÔ∏è #GirlScoutCookie #doughnuts are in FULL SWING today ‚ÄºÔ∏è YOU üç© want to miss these bad boys!! üî•üî•," they captioned the shot.
The shop's owner, Desdemona Dalia, reportedly buys several thousand boxes of Girl Scout Cookies each year, and typically serves the specialty doughnuts until July.
Loading View on Instagram
Loading View on Instagram
Some die-hard Girl Scout Cookie fans have already made the trip to Broad Street Dough Co. to try the confections for themselves. "When you drive an hour to get donuts but they are the best donuts isn't the world üëÖüëÖüëÖüòç broad street donuts are to die for. Girl Scout Cookie donuts," one Instagram user captioned a shot of the treats. "What did you do on your day off? I went on a 3 hour pilgrimage to the Jersey Shore to collect these flavor bombs. #cheatlikeyoumeanit #girlscoutcookiedonuts," wrote another . Time well spent, if you ask us.
Loading View on Instagram
Loading View on Instagram
Loading View on Instagram
Broad Street Dough Co. is located at 2005 Route 35 N Oakhurst, New Jersey. And we are currently on our way there.
